contribution_desc:
A proposal for an infrastructure for authoring multi-model applications across multiple devices.
An architecture is presented and a prototype implementation. The architecture allows for creating applications that e.g. can combine voice control from a phone with output on a PDA.
toolkits: Java; JME CDC; Sphinx 4 speech recognizer engine; FreeTTS
crossdevice_def: "Next generation applications will support a variety of modalities that will be provided by more than one device. Users can carry multiple devices with them or just use fixed devices in their environment. The applications will adapt themselves with respect to rendering according to changes in the user's context."
